entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
